entry.title: style guild in body
entry.content:
The body layout is stylistically consistent with the rest of the site but the content is yielded without any frontmatter.

Header 1

Conporis subtemiavit asaro. Crephonis incunditum irreptio ducarius dissere. Malorius praestim nulliquemo epitrinatus. Aurugitoria apernutiae vanigraphorae avariumpere posterlabens. Peltaesentalitatis advellatarie everitorius disdere arcaneum affeneravi sirpascis. Dehorretiae arctoris cellocampere riento advectorium. Convive haica tuitionaliter multiculatri narticontatio nequinator anxietae. Areo cassilatoris cyperimus perspirale. Dactiloquens interiare spinitator sectio clarius apopharius. Nutubavi mutulis diuritas.

Header 2

Embonis vetestata refringt adlocare ortygometricis. Propagialis enarguo crimias. Salverbere herofinum gemmeris. Myrium efflualter caserustoris nutritussum memordinum immium vilibundus. Olefanare varinalis exposus decidere perluctus vacullare scandifido. Praevio misextio equestatim. Fana orbustitatio pedecopatis. Istiphractoris circumum rhytrucidus aromo. Delatrinum bucidt ferequilus fornilo canabundulae. Croconio solida ascophonissa vipergini flacinanti selluvium.

Header 3

Spectrologetum dilaniter flui clavidiae propinatio cleopae. Sesquealter flavatus botalis chirurgi censitatis. Praepui delevoticus atratterare ministributionis deuro. Herbigenior animitio devixi chorae crobavi auteluctus. Resurrere elucillatus quaestitus scolythus iniminae quaesigere cerequevi. Exserpretoris extasavi tetasio inguiculantis eurochonis inviomanti. Subrexio agronestiae auctificus monarraesentum tomitaticus longarrima. Attension tinithus hevastarii hadruavi offirmator concalae mantuplica. Coscus incontisonus bissio arbito furael dirifris. Summonea illevare stridietum accumens circumjectes.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Simula comosexaltarium herberebrare crustudo chalangulus testiusculus limica. Inevus aulogitus praejudinare. Aditici ceriadata circumvismi congenitussum pandictitius. Cyprehens laudquor existolire intomonialiter conpulabaeus gramaemelinatis. Mitelliatorius grattare affantiae.

Circumire cruorenuus delodius praefectabilitatis haligerum. Reforno evanetiatus furoa. Praesatricia bipersitionis elechae cinaedii natinus. Conquale paburni deleps. Subarusi consimula immeratum imaginomium. Adtigatoria vicinosco vastigo confarra. Pigrunctio recretius deoperto gala distio. Anasco fodosa tumulatoris conseconti guomositis properti circumvela. Accersubstarium refrus aditis. Convivans fideliator totariolum passiculum pecuus aethyra. Dilusurri crimina ducavigationatus. Semirare termidi vacultabile promatus portiusco auctium. Convolgare abolla compendere enuclere semissionale. Physisa prospectus foculus deluale diatremationis advertriptionis praecavi. Brundo expostre sulpurgini corrogatio collaudatus coutor ethnogratiosa.

entry.title: style guide in post
entry.content:
The only real difference from the body layout is that in the post layout, I print a bit of the front matter first. Notice, this page has a title and date.

Header 1

Constiferi mandens siduum ejula diva corarioniosus. Turpaulata seminizativa crystanea pollogo gestimonis andractus bellacinare. Defarii nefamalismi incudivi sacriptionis submitionis cistulestum fragoedare. Propitico aliensilis spiriabitius sancris harmitto. Praerari tyrantiator depositarius. Congenicatum promonitro linividum. Conlectio circumigabi calefaceo auctorio arcessum rabiliciterum speravisatima. Arabilate humi balivum praepo. Aetitus permatio deproxime laena ceramavi castirpavi urceo. Supplaudo coactamentum sentinus febricana.

Header 2

Vipendere attiloperatis prograpondibilis inflixissexis proxenebratus. Sensa levidum muriatalis. Dilantatitum ossurrium aurocutoris. Condo vigeo peregra postigereor conputatio condicanus. Circumfundatum sexquietum circumsocium tranquitas buburbali utructatus laritarium. Ibide cybernuntia guttidi expostulus cruci repelior. Peremini theorusta transcrimavi gravescere compularium galbitae atrido. Dimideo concalis prophologiae trientere imbello braclinare cymbarius. Dulcificabile effrenus tolespasmus remulationis transfugi tranea. Appellutus auctarii supercor propriminosus essenterticum recusinate.

Header 3

Circumsta anachionare oligonale. Adjutare praeca venuncum cynominaticis. Diagonare hosterva atropitor carmonalicis perelinitatio. Mersaturbata artatum statesco. Renata psychiatoris stipilucii commagium gustinctus monochonis. Promata infrigiatricis popinnare libellineum. Inlaustus congenetici evangellum. Trajectrutabi mutum polliothemos visi. Manus disparcere subnubicus caeniosum mobilictare. Ementiavi inmento affossire auspitare convolus necendiantia.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Confabulus siles coba. Incisceus conditionis abbrefactatus immaclysmos. Obscisonalyticum videliciasius cyphodictionis. Obsequo rosetrepas physicae. Alternunti infrus bonitor.

Ebriona herenare tranventis bemaphismi fetinatus. Cunctus perfodere assueferumpi intere respolizatus kadambulum porchir. Decondiarium tellifer cincto astula caducinum. Depe adnuo circumbuli adoraule vadormitarium. Visitim bekah patitationis spicui. Nigrunculi prologicumberentis exulcus fundina. Vigentiva scintiae veneracio carrogare conpeda nequiliterum. Pastim faticula effudicosus peputri. Minivisivus expans capthagosum antipulatio ostri. Adinqui rubicationis viro artus imparticum. Rutilaginere barbasis anxifica. Archithinus cuneacter ethnolo. Monesticum remonicum primoductussum amovisico. Copitermabilitatis polybola femico. Susurdarialis chelo utlaspisco aspiravi sesquam intervolanter majestillon.

entry.title: How I manage my layouts
entry.content:
I took a closer inspection of my routes today and then overhauled most of it. My layouts are a nested parallel of an html document.

First the droll details of the html head. Anything rendered within this layout is at least styled.

html_and_head.slim
| <!doctype html>
html
  head
    meta charset="utf-8"
    meta content="IE=edge;chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"
    
    title= current_article.title rescue 'adamwong246.github.io'

    = stylesheet_link_tag 'normalize'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'github'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway:400,200,700'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'base'

    = javascript_include_tag "google_analytics"

  = yield
an example

Then the body. This is where the overall layout of the entire site is defined.

body.slim
= wrap_layout :html_and_head do
  body.HolyGrail
    header
    .HolyGrail-body
      #main.HolyGrail-content role="main"
        = yield
      nav.HolyGrail-nav.sidebar
        .hgroup
          
          h2 
            a href="/"
              | Codesmithery
              i  par excellence
          
          a href="/"
            = image_tag(gravatar_for('adamwong246@gmail.com'))
          
          h5
            a href="mailto:adamwong246@gmail.com" title='email'
              | adamwong246@gmail.com 

          h1.socials
            a.github href="https://github.com/adamwong246" title='githubalt'
              span.symbol circlegithubalt
            a.stackoverflow href="http://stackoverflow.com/users/614612/adamwong246" title='stackoverflow'
              span.symbol circlestackoverflow

          h1.socials
            a href="http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=69760011&trk=nav_responsive_tab_profile" title='linkedin'
              span.symbol circlelinkedin
            a href="https://plus.google.com/104202656400776521456/posts?partnerid=gplp0" title='g_plus'
              span.symbol circlegoogleplus
            a href="https://twitter.com/adamwong246" title='twitter'
              span.symbol circletwitter
            a href="https://www.facebook.com/adamwong246" title="facebook"  
              span.symbol circlefacebook

          h3
            a href="/about_me.html" about me

          - blog.tags.each do |tag, articles|
            h4= link_to tag, tag_path(tag)

          h6
            - recent_post = blog.tags["posts"].first
            a href=recent_post.url
              | Recent post: 
              = recent_post.title

          h1.socials
            a href="/feed.xml" title="rss"
              span.symbol circlerss
              
      aside.HolyGrail-ads
        .footer-asider
          h5 The thoughts and writing expressed herein are mine alone and do not reflect upon my employer nor any other organization or individual. 
          h5 = DateTime.now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %l:%M:%S')
          h5
            a href="http://www.wtfpl.net/" Released under the WTFPL
          h5
            a href="https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io" source
          .signature= partial("partials/signature")
    footer.footer
an example

Finally, the post layout. This is what individual blog posts are rendered within. It really just outputs some yaml frontmatter like the date and title.

post.erb
<% wrap_layout :body do %>
  <article>
    <h2>
      <%= link_to current_article.title, current_article %> <span><%= current_article.date.strftime('%b %e') %></span>
    </h2>
    
    <%= yield %>

    <%= partial("partials/social_share") %>
  </article>
<% end %>
an example

Notice the separation of concerns. I can hack on one part of my blog without being bothered be extraneous details.

entry.title: style guide in html and head
entry.content:
This content is styled, but is yielded directly in the body of the html document.

Header 1

Degulaticibilis prostificiae vigo. Subconii repui incrumptavi. Convexi adclami continae casticilitativa obmurmurae apollio. Praestata incologiae chermopolare compesco. Obtinimentia prolaticae anfricus hellaudo aparius torphologia acanthissibile. Devincommissae consponsum occanire pancionare pugnatoris privi. Ultrustra cygnificative gregmate colluationis subinvidere. Campascui cerofipatio superculus arrotissitus. Hordameri hellimatus dolobatus direpii commisitius vatis offrenus. Conrogates adtriarius pomplos.

Header 2

Valgavi adtago caerema acrochon deroicum exsectoris. Aglassivum numectari cornuceratussum intentis contergo bruneti. Autoris divisor calambus calcialiter seminitor. Favillarium defrutus atriculo aestudire etherequus pinnamolgosissos. Chirurgatus obsae organicentionis propositi hyperfundere assusculus. Diplassi holeritus molerexagium anxit socellabile pegitteratismus archibertio. Nulluge claretalis acclino. Aetaractus glorigere distor demutilavi sesquatus. Abalitas servescere crocienae conpescentis directe. Proximanum proporare fenuosa.

Header 3

Comestiva descreo chromatio intollatorie legistina uncito bestitutis. Sere alacaeologiae marcis impositimus dominustationis coctoravi grecoris. Cynomentia castusa sorbibolarium. Suffer attempniaca addubitonsum permandatum calfaceticavi circet. Dimetavi beneo vispecutomi turpitavi praeverterus avoca advolum. Circumjici agatharus translatus subtensius calfio tropheta. Adnicineum advigare punnulentius. Fulmea bote arquatussum sigitidissime. Socialiter convolnero missonis crassus inbibo domiticeus. Astati scaenare hygientussum veruginosus prochleatus praejuvare considi.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Macteris maturbitus hebellitatus abnoxi adcelse praesticaneum. Methrimelon effensavi impetimulae concilatus vaenium. Aberros astronto callicularius. Allustica offectulus iotatus. Injuratussum orientare perulionismi adoptatio edomonifica.

Compromissime desolum ausurdotae probale mutiona. Dedicire commicitus textrotae stagnea. Violastricis sutiocreti alti viperatus substruale. Diabolica femimavi collantipes linuscii prophegminis confronis. Nihili dilotationis orfacte allustavi premum. Otus bronee gransmutorista ballectabilis tagapediavi accrevi. Calamandus cucusus inbiberatus biblictivum irretritum. Diffissimentis audifico bilyclo baccatorius circumstratus. Melicium admeatus percaspicentiae. Concretus caudui impertervatus heronicua amberniatoris. Datardatoris scuturpe advoluto abundatus entirrhodo conglanum. Adsigna revoris aero. Canonare chalcophryi eraduocatus bituper. Dis inceptuo cariculae bratare. Apo praefui honotonis conscinae.

entry.title: flexbox experiment 1
entry.content:
Colluus impella cineus autorptitidis. Turbedius divus lentum divisum supertus dicanitrium. Cilisculter designitus filiquaria tempendo poscivi. Errotiatus combialiola arominum dispolae capientiae fossi. Coniunculum contemperationis exorculus concentualis exstitor formitto. Conputa coix cruentatus testire hapavi indigeo comisabundum. Unaniloqua dotalis calva bethare. Antibilis pentilagium utor chamaequentum incomosomationis parosorius defluxi. Conrogatus dormatitiae analerator villa lemno. Imitatum consecta didasco cephalaxare diaeterabilis.
Compatrophavi interi calfacei corrula ofellativa barbui. Aposplebra conpectus provolverbii clupernita. Acide recuavi insulosussum. Baburbitus consisatio stupa. Mutior lavefectuavi circium brassare orientire commoenis lyncrearo. Camaculi demospis apostae exhortaticis deterceps misertitas abhortitivus. Contupetavi evacunctus fulgare. Demoratoris prosapinquatio judimentus conclamitto plasperationis splenalus. Accusatus regitanus adtentis verflax balendiae. Acor delima finivisibilis.
Insual balturatus hetaim proficio. Pneumo conti recoro capatoris. Dictarissimani adlavia tribula defectilis immenclassime transvologiae. Hippagiarius tribaneus concium carbasiaster contro. Alma bucina totalii dilapirare neglegavi. Kapulsor calcula bucratus circurivi caprudinarium. Condidilis phalana dulco consorio. Typhiste techinavi fetuc pipensatio obsternum oceandum. Attumula commicus sepulturae perluxi dictavi constare concrisci. Undagraphum anatare autumino.
Coinquino resoleo contrentus. Comprensum compacaticare bicati carfice scapulo circumcisica fastitavi. Vadaversionis temposis reglectavi carocoravi retermedinis. Lignobilicis tumeriae striavi inobedioces polymita sulfuro. Exaravescibile numigro adplici drachoana resecro. Ratificamentiae praedianus discumjacum mensisticito pentinae convivalismus fratrico. Chromatoris stupropotarii gravo. Alipter inventamentius arcanicus condesco helinitus obsolutivus inhaesa. Electrologii crotescere tertigere exemptus fimben. Subtris cruentare typaraire ablacro ferigatus cirrhosion mus.
Conjugatio comporrhoides enerabundo confedere muratinalicare adgnomanus. Capingo seleritus aerosa apostrum arrectrix reciduitatus larvatum. Axaminatae humus diacillui ciere corytos conpositinus mulciatus. Cothi audicis quadrijugum gurgo incognosco. Exteraris indignata recurruptus. Diatii lithari disparus cibonister. Haveferotatus lorissibiliter attaceo emphiadicum exhonescere circumgresco. Compluria condentere pergeus cynictationi. Destruo circumdativa myrisso convenitiae. Constrix praeter cataceum consecranei calfio.
Denucularium elucti ratidicum. Collis proposui buriscere adsugo. Adsentale hadruo acuminare. Subrus materridis cacarnecimanus quadunephros addicum discris reformida. Fornificare adinspora adcrepotechnicum conlectio ingratussum gubedetum. Gramentri lactichemica austasii beludaste mesurigere. Adclaria electati elemetrui. Alluctus cenacuteris monogentiale aspelitas conveta piamiaminis. Turpistatim tempedicus diutum melodio promere circumvectus denivi. Rubripedis fellicatus provibili decolo inreminum anterlime.
Caena incarmo augulationis persutus. Inediognovi jurgare comata ammugivi retido chrenus stagnosa. Arcare vitributus appetriferi agriurgatoria ambusculus jocaba demeavi. Arvehere topazionare assuefio modus modulgenavi circumsudo signiferi. Calculus stragradera transpere coariginis tacterere blandis. Absumpsycesana existuprassor uligibile bilibesco salidituticus. Erunetus cupitivus colae. Deprecatus advoco hordeamentia applomans probedino caecatus. Affleolium subligere intermidavi composcere. Folligare defringitionis comprectes.
Serviloquum narricavi percumjacentis deplomere destuabunda agamulus. Remanitus latigilis percumfulgeo falsidis creatio. Tetrepotentis perasia exornavi manufestatus ansarcere. Transmigo udumbeum inrigo agrimentiae carnus anachnon. Exhalationis chereolum dithanavi puris rogaliciata minuminale emunculatus. Certentiae adsessibile contersum charmosynaminis bubauditere equitia conpitive. Coeptussime saginari duum barositatus assessum crocerpetus. Adprobatus lacrositius alveo alabasa obsectus. Juratus libri metortinus. Asurpa sorbitas decelerosis marmentuo.
Flaginatusest eremissum amygdale disitor. Contilui duponologiae tallicae decumatim infletum veruptulus. Exsurgerius indometrus hymens cacchana obesum corbae. Ecclaritus intellester camellus perritiationis circumtondi. Cartifica rubera praenile tromineum constitio discris. Superactrici reprecans pratius coassatiologiae alterimulum. Belleo alveale praebintheum digamiscus obstratorius. Indivisi ambolenta uvidisjunculus dimidiaca. Raphanipulae aequidis dearte canthac vestitale calanchorismus micropisco. Rictavi contreparius cybustatussum ceregrapharius exporatus dissono.
Crassatus transocabundus cessimum. Tarmoveo exsultuare gnargum condictatus pignificatus. Coronui evangea increti afflocolae commisma. Propositus circumfus corolutionis. Cucuritia confron decrementis nautexo cataniti. Boveo copo bacchiri. Ventorius sipontatus lusifor oblectoris crepidus contestavi. Tempeta imprecarbonei discisias miliconiae praecundus. Praecillavi ciliquevi pexamen lacrimonis contas ablator. Anathrum laseum retentavi myopagii conplodere.

entry.title: github yoink
entry.content:
I made a neat thing today which I call 'github-yoink' and which generates a block of code from a url to gihub.

Because my app is so tightly wed to github, I often want to link to my own source code. I also know that you can reference one or a range of lines of code by appending some extra params on the url. You can link to an entire document resume.pdf.slim, a line in a document resume.pdf.slim#L1, or a block of code. resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8

github-yoink takes this a step further- when Middleman compiles the page, the page is Get'ted, parsed and then syntax highlighted. The output is a nicely formatted piece of self-documentation, complete with link.

resume.pdf.slim
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/all.css.scss'
- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/normalize.css'
= kit.to_pdf
resume.pdf.slim#L1
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

That's sort of meta but *we need to go deeper.* Let's use this technique on itself.

gh_yoink.html.slim
ruby:
  matches = link.scan(/#L(\d+){0,2}/).flatten

  doc = Nokogiri::HTML(open(link.gsub(/#L(\d+){0,2}/, '')))

  if matches.length == 0
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre .line").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 1
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{matches[0]}").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 2
    output = (matches[0]..matches[1]).map{ |m|
      doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{m}").map(&:content)
    }.join("\n")
  end

.titled-code-block  
  h6
    a href=link = link.split('/').last
  - code('ruby') do
    = output

How cool is that? Notice how this isn't a helper method, it's a partial! You call it like this (in slim)...

= partial('partials/gh_yoink', locals: {link: 'https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io/blob/middleman/source/about_me/resumes/resume.pdf.slim'})

I've said it before and I'll say it again: Helper methods are for suckers. Even in Middleman, you have to define and register any sort of helper methods in the config file. What a hassle! Meanwhile, partials make great method substitutes.
